item.title: An app a day keeps the greenhouse effect at bay
item.author: Theana Johnson,
item.description: To start, a few facts: 12 million tons of plastic end up in our oceans each year. One third of all food produced globally goes to waste. The greenhouse gas emissions involved in the production of food which go to waste mean that if food waste were a country it would be the third largest emitter of â€¦
